About

Hi and welcome to my portfolio. My name is Peter Møller Jensen, 30 years old of age and have spend the majority of my life creating, developing and designing.

Basic and advanced layouts for websites, applications and dashboards for private- and bussiness clients. With a palette of design options and layouts you need to design your next project.

I have specialized in front-end developing, graphical design and understanding. Music and sound creation and editing. Photography, Movie and film making. Advanced animation, functional prototype creation and digital content development.

Unique responsive UI/UX platforms with back-end programming, ready to-go solutions for independant bussinesses and startups.

Always improving, and updating my skillset, I move with the trend. I'm fluid in most programming languages and aim to claim a big variety of skills to improve my work.
More details? - see my cv here.

A look at the details

Web based

Unique responsive go-to solutions for websites, applications and dashboards. UI/UX kits designed and developed to contain every thinkable concept. Contact me for your next project.

Solutions

Tailored solutions for privates, bussinesses, or startups. Based on frameworks such as bootstrap and jquery, or coded from scratch with your unique touch. Start your project today.

Sustainability

Every solution are made to hold the time of the trends. Easy customizable, colors, fonts and icons all ready to be changed to your liking. Creativity has no limits. Lets begin!
